The My Little Pony: Equestria Girls franchise that ran from 2013-2020, and featured humanized versions of the characters from My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic
Series of comics produced by IDW alongside Friendship is Magic, which features some unique characters and alternate continuity.
My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic
The main animated show for Generation 4 of the My Little Pony franchise, including My Little Pony: the Movie (2017) and Rainbow Roadtrip (2019).
The fifth generation of the My Little Pony franchise, starting with My Little Pony: A New Generation (2021) and including the TV series Make Your Mark and Tell Your Tale.
